overview: Millionaire Baron de Courland and his fianc√©e Linda Stewart employ Jim Logan as a guide for their hunting trip in the jungle. Linda finds unplanned adventure in her sudden love for Jim, ultimately forsaking her future with the Baron for the joys of true love.
tagline: It's a Safari of Love! Burning sands . . . burning lips! It's night-time on the glamorous Nile!
title: Safari
